posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase any of the following T206 in SGC50 or better (NO PSA PLEASE):

Red Ames (Hands At Chest)
Red Ames (Hands Above Head)
Harry Bay
Bill Bernhard
Kitty Bransfield
Ted Breitenstein
Al Burch (Batting)
Scoops Carey
Hal Chase (Pink Portrait)
Hal Chase (Throwing White Cap)
Ed Cicotte

Thanks for looking,
Phil
Phil, I know you said no PSA but I will let you look just in case! I have these. Make me an offer if your interested?  Thanks,  Marc

Hi Marc,

Didn't get a chance yesterday to respond to you.  I'm really not interested in PSA at all.  Don't want to spend the money on a PSA5 and then spend more money to cross it over to SGC to find out that they won't cross it over at a 5.  Just not worth the time and money to take a chance like that.

The Chase, White Cap looks like a nice card, but again, not interested in raw cards right now.  Strictly SGC50 or better.

Thanks for your consideration.

Phil

Got the Harry Bay (thanks Anthony).  Making generous offers for the above in SGC50 or better.

Any Red Ames out there?

Hi Phil,
Here's a Bransfield scan.  If interested, PM or email [url]Jct43@embarqmail.com[/url]
for price and details.

Thanks,
Charlie
